name: Coup Die'tat
description:
The lowly die of the kingdom are trying to tear down the castle walls and over throw the D20 King. Use your artillery dice to fend 3 Waves and defend your dynasty!

Red Dice- Instant Explosion Dice

Blue Dice- Freezes all enemies caught in the radius temporarily

Yellow Dice- Creates an acid pool that deals damage over time and slows enemies

Controls:

Simply drag and release to throw your dice. The higher the roll, the greater the radius of the effect.
